mapper.select: select m.perms from tb_cl_privilege_role r left join tb_cl_privilege_user_role ur on(r.role_id = ur.role_id) left join tb_cl_privilege_user u on(u.user_id = ur.user_id) left join tb_cl_privilege_role_menu rm on(rm.role_id = r.role_id) left join tb_cl_privilege_menu m on(m.menu_id = rm.menu_id ) where u.username = #{userName} and m.perms is not null

select m.* from tb_cl_privilege_menu m where m.type <> 1 and m.MENU_ID in (select distinct rm.menu_id from tb_cl_privilege_role_menu rm left join tb_cl_privilege_role r on(rm.role_id = r.role_id) left join tb_cl_privilege_user_role ur on(ur.role_id = r.role_id) left join tb_cl_privilege_user u on (u.user_id = ur.user_id) where u.username = #{userName})

select t1.menu_id as menuId, t1.parent_id as parentId, t1.menu_name as menuName, t1.url as url, t1.perms as perms , t1.icon as icon , t1.order_num as orderNum, t2.role_ids as roleIds from tb_cl_privilege_menu t1 left join ( select menu_id,wm_concat(role_id) as role_ids from tb_cl_privilege_role_menu group by menu_id )t2 on t1.menu_id = t2.menu_id
